title: Coronavirus vaccine from Moderna shows early signs of viral immune response
author: Robert Langreth; Bloomberg
description: Coronavirus vaccine from Moderna in first human trial showed promising early signs that it can create an immune-system response in the body that could help fend off the Covid-19
cleaned_text: PM IST] Coronavirus vaccine from Moderna shows early signs of viral immune response Coronavirus vaccine from Moderna in first human trial showed promising early signs that it can create an immune-system response in the body that could help fend off the Covid-19 [] NEW YORK : An experimental vaccine from Moderna Inc. showed promising early signs that it can create an immune-system response in the body that could help fend off the new coronavirus, according to sampling of data from a small, first human trial of the inoculation.
